price: (31) From Pharaoh. Indeed, he was a haughty one among the transgressors.
arabic: مِن فِرۡعَوۡنَۚ إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ عَالِيٗا مِّنَ ٱلۡمُسۡرِفِينَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: min fir'ʿawna innahu kāna ʿāliyan mina al-mus'rifīna
